description: Try our easy to follow Panna Cotta with Sauterne Grapes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Panna Cotta with Sauterne Grapes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Run a knife around the inside of the moulds and turn panna cotta out onto serving plates. Spoon over grape sauce.
